M9Z.SG.summary: Muza S.A. publishes books in Poland. It publishes various categories of books that include literature, crime fiction, fantastic, non-fiction, social sciences and business, cuisine and diets, culture and traditions, art and albums, guides, gadgets, audiobooks, history, biographies, and horror, as well as books for children and youth. The company also operates online bookstores and various outlets. Muza S.A. was founded in 1991 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
